text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki, Biko Pegasus, and Hishi<n>Akebono
finish the Mile Championship<n>in a blaze of glory.
They grin at each<n>other in satisfied exhaustion
after<n>running their hearts out in a fierce<n>struggle
for first.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Their positive emotions touch the hearts<n>of the
audience too. Even the younger<n>racer who has
been watching Fuji Kiseki<n>is moved to tears.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
After the race, she asks to participate in<n>the
Takamatsunomiya Kinen, a<n>1,200-meter G1 turf
sprint.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
I'm puzzled by her straightforward<n>suggestion
considering how much of a<n>trickster she usually is,
but she must<n>have a reason.
